titles.title: Permanently Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act of 2010
To permanently extend the Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act of 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 3/4/2010--Introduced. Permanently Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act of 2010 - Amends the Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act of 2009 to repeal its sunset date December 31, 2012 (thus making the Act permanent).
